item.description:
Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group will be on December 12th at 7:00 PM at my house in Coventry (directions below). I look forward to seeing everyone I met previously, and I am also excited to meet our new members.
We decided to have a Vegan potluck. I will be making Vegan Chili. Please remember to bring a copy of your recipe to share with the group. It will also be useful for any of our members that have food allergies. If you need ideas on what to bring, let me know. Please remember to RSVP, and feel free to bring a friend.

Directions:
I-95 to exit 6 (not 6a)
Turn on to Route 3 North off ramp
Straight through first stop light
Take first left (Just before second stop light) on to Magnolia Drive (look for white fence and Wood Estates sign)
Second Right on to Rustic Way
Left on to Circlewood Drive
Second house on Right – 39 Circlewood Drive (Beige raised ranch)

Please let me know if you need any additional information.

Your Friend – Kevin 401-308-7812

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Coventry Vegan Potluck
